docs.text: CLI Reference This page provides documentation for our command line tools. project Manage apix project Usage: project [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]... Options: --help Show this message and exit. bash Attach to Odoo container bash Usage: project bash [OPTIONS] NAME Options: --help Show this message and exit. clear Clear project containers Usage: project clear [OPTIONS] NAME Options: --yes --help Show this message and exit. delete Delete local project Usage: project delete [OPTIONS] NAME Options: --yes --help Show this message and exit. install-modules Update modules on database Usage: project install-modules [OPTIONS] NAME DATABASE MODULES Options: --help Show this message and exit. last-backup Get last url backup for online project Usage: project last-backup [OPTIONS] NAME Options: --help Show this message and exit. locate Locate project on disk Usage: project locate [OPTIONS] NAME Options: --help Show this message and exit. logs Show container logs Usage: project logs [OPTIONS] NAME SERVICE Options: --help Show this message and exit. merge Merge requirements from online manifest and local repositories. NAME is the name of the local project. Usage: project merge [OPTIONS] NAME Options: --help Show this message and exit. new Create new project from online database. NAME is the name of the database. Usage: project new [OPTIONS] NAME Options: -l, --local Create blank project --help Show this message and exit. pull Pull repositories Usage: project pull [OPTIONS] NAME Options: --help Show this message and exit. restart Run project Usage: project restart [OPTIONS] NAME Options: -d, --detach Run on background (detach) --help Show this message and exit. run Run project Usage: project run [OPTIONS] NAME Options: -d, --detach Running on background (detach) -r, --reload Dev mode (auto reload) --help Show this message and exit. search Search for online project Usage: project search [OPTIONS] NAME Options: --help Show this message and exit. shell Attach to Odoo shell Usage: project shell [OPTIONS] NAME DATABASE Options: --help Show this message and exit. show Show project containers Usage: project show [OPTIONS] NAME Options: --help Show this message and exit. stop Stop project containers Usage: project stop [OPTIONS] NAME Options: --help Show this message and exit. update Update the local project based on the manifest. NAME is the name of the local project. Note: Repositorie and requirements are updated. Usage: project update [OPTIONS] NAME Options: --yes --help Show this message and exit. update-modules Update modules on database Usage: project update-modules [OPTIONS] NAME DATABASE MODULES Options: --help Show this message and exit.
docs.title: Project

docs.text: Locate project on disk Usage: project locate [OPTIONS] NAME Options: --help Show this message and exit.
docs.title: locate

docs.text: Show container logs Usage: project logs [OPTIONS] NAME SERVICE Options: --help Show this message and exit.
docs.title: logs

docs.text: Merge requirements from online manifest and local repositories. NAME is the name of the local project. Usage: project merge [OPTIONS] NAME Options: --help Show this message and exit.
docs.title: merge

docs.text: Create new project from online database. NAME is the name of the database. Usage: project new [OPTIONS] NAME Options: -l, --local Create blank project --help Show this message and exit.
docs.title: new

docs.text: Pull repositories Usage: project pull [OPTIONS] NAME Options: --help Show this message and exit.
docs.title: pull

docs.text: Run project Usage: project restart [OPTIONS] NAME Options: -d, --detach Run on background (detach) --help Show this message and exit.
docs.title: restart

docs.text: Run project Usage: project run [OPTIONS] NAME Options: -d, --detach Running on background (detach) -r, --reload Dev mode (auto reload) --help Show this message and exit.
docs.title: run

docs.text: Search for online project Usage: project search [OPTIONS] NAME Options: --help Show this message and exit.
docs.title: search

docs.text: Attach to Odoo shell Usage: project shell [OPTIONS] NAME DATABASE Options: --help Show this message and exit.
docs.title: shell

docs.text: Show project containers Usage: project show [OPTIONS] NAME Options: --help Show this message and exit.
docs.title: show

docs.text: Stop project containers Usage: project stop [OPTIONS] NAME Options: --help Show this message and exit.
docs.title: stop

docs.text: Update the local project based on the manifest. NAME is the name of the local project. Note: Repositorie and requirements are updated. Usage: project update [OPTIONS] NAME Options: --yes --help Show this message and exit.
docs.title: update

docs.text: Update modules on database Usage: project update-modules [OPTIONS] NAME DATABASE MODULES Options: --help Show this message and exit.
docs.title: update-modules
